modules.name: simplex & hold
modules.description: sample & hold module using internal simplex noise source

modules.name: blank 6hp
modules.description: a simple blank

modules.name: polyrand
modules.description: output a random channel of a poly input with a trigger

modules.name: noize
modules.description: random noise generator with duration parameter and 0-10V cv input

modules.name: steps
modules.description: a simple 8 step sequencer with randomize trigger and eoc output

modules.name: fibb
modules.description: a clock divider based on the fibonacci sequence

modules.name: oct sclr
modules.description: scales voltage to specified octave range

modules.name: shift
modules.description: an 8-step shift register with probability params for each step

modules.name: mlt
modules.description: two 1:5 polyphonic multiples

modules.name: math
modules.description: applies various math operations on two inputs, clamped to +/-10V

modules.name: logic
modules.description: perform logical operations on two inputs

modules.name: probably not
modules.description: mute a signal on trigger, based on probability

modules.name: polyplay
modules.description: load and play a sample polyphonically

modules.name: lights
modules.description: lights turn on when gate is high. 'latch' mode toggles lights on trigger

modules.name: slips
modules.description: generate random melodies, with optional random offsets each cycle, quantized to a scale

modules.name: turnt
modules.description: generate triggers when a CV signal changes direction, crosses zero, or both

modules.name: slipspander
modules.description: expander for slips to enter custom scale

modules.name: nos
modules.description: a weird noise-based oscillator thing

modules.name: lucc
modules.description: a clock divider based on the lucas sequence

modules.name: polyshuffle
modules.description: shuffle the channels of a polyphonic signal, with various modes

modules.name: polycounter
modules.description: count up or down on trigger with custom start/end/increment values
